waao package

Submodules

waao.conversion module

waao.conversion.checkFilePermissions(inputPath: Path, outputPath: Path, needWrite: bool = False) → None[source]

Check file permissions and existence.

waao.conversion.convertPngToJpg(pngFilePath: str | Path, outputJpgPath: str | Path, quality: int = 85) → None[source]

Convert a PNG image to JPG.

Args:

pngFilePath: Path to the input PNG file. outputJpgPath: Path where the output JPG will be saved. quality: Quality of the output JPG (1-100).

Raises:

FileNotFoundError: If the input file doesn’t exist. PermissionError: If there are permission issues. ValueError: If quality is not between 1 and 100. Exception: For other conversion errors.

waao.conversion.convertTextToPdf(textFilePath: str | Path, outputPdfPath: str | Path) → None[source]

Convert a text file to PDF.

Args:

textFilePath: Path to the input text file. outputPdfPath: Path where the output PDF will be saved.

Raises:

FileNotFoundError: If the input file doesn’t exist. PermissionError: If there are permission issues. Exception: For other conversion errors.

waao.conversion.convertWordToPdf(wordFilePath: str | Path, outputPdfPath: str | Path) → None[source]

Convert a Word document to PDF.

Args:

wordFilePath: Path to the input Word document. outputPdfPath: Path where the output PDF will be saved.

Raises:

FileNotFoundError: If the input file doesn’t exist. PermissionError: If there are permission issues. Exception: For other conversion errors.

waao.conversion.mergePdfFiles(pdfFiles: List[str | Path], outputPdfPath: str | Path) → None[source]

Merge multiple PDF files into one.

Args:

pdfFiles: List of paths to the input PDF files. outputPdfPath: Path where the output merged PDF will be saved.

Raises:

FileNotFoundError: If any input file doesn’t exist. PermissionError: If there are permission issues. ValueError: If no PDF files are provided. Exception: For other merging errors.

waao.disp module

waao.disp.checkFilePermissions(filePath: str = 'C:\\') → Dict[str, bool] | None[source]

Checks permissions for specified file or directory.

Args:

filePath: Path to check (default “C:")

Returns:

Dictionary with read/write/execute permissions if exists, None otherwise

waao.disp.displayFileLines(fromStart: bool, numLines: int, fileName: str, filePath: str = 'C:\\') → List[str] | None[source]

Displays specified number of lines from either start or end of a file.

Args:

fromStart: True for first lines, False for last lines numLines: Number of lines to display fileName: Name of file to read filePath: Path to file (default “C:")

Returns:

List of lines if successful, None otherwise

waao.disp.findFilesOrDirs(findFiles: bool, path: str) → List[str][source]

Finds either files or directories in specified path.

Args:

findFiles: True to find files, False to find directories path: Directory path to search

Returns:

List of file/directory names found

waao.disp.findPatternInFile(pattern: str, fileName: str, filePath: str = 'C:\\') → int[source]

Searches for pattern in file and returns line number of first match.

Args:

pattern: Text pattern to search for fileName: Name of file to search filePath: Path to file (default “C:")

Returns:

Line number (1-based) if found, -1 otherwise

waao.disp.openFile(fileName: str, filePath: str = 'C:\\') → TextIO | None[source]

Opens a file for reading and writing. Tries to open in current directory first, then in the provided path if not found.

Args:

fileName: Name of the file to open filePath: Path where the file is located (default “C:")

Returns:

File object if successful, None otherwise

waao.fileops module

waao.fileops.compressFile(fileList: List[str], zipName: str, zipFormat: str) → bool[source]

Creates a compressed archive from a list of files.

Args:

fileList: List of file paths to include in the archive. zipName: The name of the archive to create. zipFormat: The archive format (“zip”, “tar”, “gztar”, “bztar”).

Returns:

True if archive was created successfully, False otherwise.

waao.fileops.makeFile(fileName: str, extension: str) → bool[source]

Creates a new file with the specified name and extension in the current directory.

Args:

fileName: The name of the file to create. extension: The extension to use for the file (e.g., “.txt”, “.c”).

Returns:

True if file was created, False if it already exists or an error occurred.

waao.fileops.makeFolder(folderName: str, folderPath: str = 'C:\\') → bool[source]

Creates a folder in the specified path.

Args:

folderName: The name of the folder to create. folderPath: The path where the folder should be created (default is “C:").

Returns:

True if folder was created or already exists, False on error.

waao.fileops.openFile(fileName: str, filePath: str = 'C:\\') → TextIO | None[source]

Opens a file for reading and writing. If the file is not found in the specified path, it attempts to open it in the current directory.

Args:

fileName: The name of the file to open. filePath: The path where the file is located (default is “C:").

Returns:

A file object for reading and writing, or None if an error occurs.

waao.fileops.sortFile(ascendingOrder: bool, fileName: str, filePath: str = 'C:\\') → bool[source]

Sorts the lines in a text file in either ascending or descending order.

Args:

ascendingOrder: If True, sort ascending; if False, sort descending. fileName: The name of the file to sort. filePath: The path where the file is located (default is “C:").

Returns:

True if sorting succeeded, False otherwise.

waao.search module

waao.search.checkFileSize(filePath: str, fileName: str, minSize: int) → Tuple[str, int] | None[source]

Checks if a file exceeds the specified size.

Args:

filePath: Directory containing the file fileName: Name of file to check minSize: Size threshold in bytes

Returns:

Tuple of (fullPath, size) if file is large enough, else None

waao.search.findDuplicateWords(fileName: str, filePath: str = 'C:\\') → List[str][source]

Finds words that appear multiple times in a file.

Args:

fileName: Name of file to analyze filePath: Path to file (default “C:")

Returns:

List of duplicate words

waao.search.findInFolder(targetType: int, targetName: str, rootPath: str = 'C:\\') → List[str][source]

Recursively searches for files/directories using multiple threads.

Args:

targetType: 0 for file, 1 for directory targetName: Name to search for rootPath: Starting directory (default “C:")

Returns:

List of full paths to matches

waao.search.findLargeFiles(directory: str, minSize: int) → List[Tuple[str, int]][source]

Finds files larger than specified size using multiple threads.

Args:

directory: Path to search minSize: Minimum file size in bytes

Returns:

List of (filePath, size) tuples

waao.search.getUniqueWords(fileName: str, filePath: str = 'C:\\') → List[str][source]

Finds words that appear only once in a file.

Args:

fileName: Name of file to analyze filePath: Path to file (default “C:")

Returns:

List of unique words

waao.search.openFile(fileName: str, filePath: str = 'C:\\') → TextIO | None[source]

Opens a file for reading and writing. Attempts to open in current directory first, then in the provided path if not found.

Args:

fileName: Name of the file to open filePath: Path to search (default “C:")

Returns:

File object if successful, None otherwise

waao.search.searchDirectory(targetType: int, targetName: str, directory: str) → List[str][source]

Searches for a file or directory in a given directory path.

Args:

targetType: 0 for file, 1 for directory targetName: Name of file/directory to find directory: Path to search in

Returns:

List of full paths to matching items

waao.search.searchPattern(fileName: str, pattern: str, filePath: str = 'C:\\') → int[source]

Finds first occurrence of a pattern in a file (case-insensitive).

Args:

fileName: Name of file to search pattern: Text pattern to find filePath: Path to file (default “C:")

Returns:

Index of first match or -1 if not found
